entry.title: the shape of being chosen
entry.summary:
Author: sourwolf97

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,615Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 33

Summary: Derek huffs, the softest hesitation of a laugh, warm against his skin. ‚ÄúYou talk in your sleep,‚Äù he counters quietly. ‚ÄúA lot.‚Äù Panic flickers up his spine before Stiles can stop it. He forces his voice to stay light, easy. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs probably just my soul trying to escape my body,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt blame it, really.‚Äù But inside, he‚Äôs scrolling through mental footage of every night he‚Äôs ever crashed here, cataloguing every murky, half-remembered dream, wondering what words might have slipped out when his guard was down. Did he say Derek‚Äôs name? Did he say I love you? Did he say don‚Äôt leave? Did he confess the whole pathetic thesis statement his brain has been footnoting for months now: I know this isn‚Äôt actually anything for you, and that‚Äôs fine, I‚Äôm fine, please just let me keep pretending until you get bored?

entry.title: You‚Äôre Safe, I‚Äôm Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,474Chapters: 12/22Kudos: 19

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight‚Äîtoo tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. ‚ÄúDunbar,‚Äù he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn‚Äôt have, ‚Äúyou‚Äôre clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.‚Äù

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,247Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 50

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it‚Äôs impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,965Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 58

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale ‚Äî the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he‚Äôs both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn‚Äôt just want to be in Derek‚Äôs orbit ‚Äî he wants to be his. Derek‚Äôs spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek‚Äôs starting to wonder if maybe it‚Äôs okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it ‚Äî the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. ‚ÄúMaybe I just wanna be yours.‚Äù A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys ‚Äî all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: LIKE A WOLF HOWLING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,244Chapters: 9/37Kudos: 1

Summary: Twelve years after Adda's rampage, a now adult Eli Hale, along with Boyd and Erica's twin daughters, is working as a supernatural contractor; traveling the US and helping people out with problems of an occult nature. When the spirits of The Grey become frightened, and a powerful hunter targets the three, Eli must return home to Beacon Hills and gather the Hale Pack to once more defend their home. A mysterious and powerful hunter, a solo artist, travels the nation in an effort to destroy the supernatural threat to humanity. When she rescues an orphaned werewolf child, the delicate threads holding her paradigm together begin to unravel. Who is this child, really? Why is she so convinced that something bigger is at play here? And why, when she follows a target to Beacon Hills, do the streets seem so familiar? Or; The Parking lot is mostly empty. The neon sign which reads VACANCIES is buzzing, loud. In the car, Amanda and Ali say something back and forth, then look at you, and then speak again. You think that they resent you for dragging them out here, yet they won't leave.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,515Chapters: 14/15Kudos: 213

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she‚Äôd finished college. He‚Äôd attended business school for a few years and decided that he‚Äôd open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they‚Äôve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1‚Äôs events. Peter doesn‚Äôt go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.
